context: The Estonian word 'üksnes' is an adverb that means 'only', 'just', or 'merely'. It's used to emphasize the limitation or exclusivity of something, indicating that there are no additional elements beyond what has been mentioned. In the examples: 'Ta üksnes naeratas' (He/She only smiled), 'Me üksnes proovisime aidata' (We just tried to help), and 'Tema ei öelnud üksnes midagi' (He/she didn't say anything at all).
